job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the foundational work of preparing and configuring cloud infrastructure, which is a key part of building and deploying applications.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van zowel de back-end als de front-end van AI-toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the core responsibilities of software development for applications, encompassing both the server-side logic and the user interface.

job_tasks.phrase: veilig en verantwoord gebruik van AI-technologieën
job_tasks.justification: While also touching on ethics, the phrase 'gebruik van AI-technologieën' in the context of application development implies the implementation of secure and responsible practices within the software itself.
This implies understanding the project's goals and contributing to its overall direction and architecture, which requires business context.

job_tasks.phrase: sterke focus op privacy en security
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the emphasis on security and privacy in application development is a crucial operational aspect for production-grade AI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: In een team van gedreven professionals draag je bij
proactief in het bieden van oplossingen
veilig en verantwoord gebruik van AI-technologieën, met een sterke focus op privacy en security

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on full-stack development and cloud expertise for AI applications, rather than specialized AI modeling or engineering. While it mentions Generative AI, it lacks specific tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering.
